creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: Keyblock proof (kyōgōzuri 校合摺); black line outline for color print: large mountain in background; band of trees in middle ground; prairie with blossoms and a stream in middle and foreground
dimension:
14 1/4 × 20 3/16 in. (36.2 × 51.28 cm) (image)
15 1/2 × 21 1/4 in. (39.37 × 53.98 cm) (sheet, horizontal, double oban)
portfolio: From Untitled series known as The United States
title: Keyblock impression for "Mt. Rainier"
